items.name: Double-Double
items.description: Two 100% American beef patties without additives, fillers or preservatives combined with 2 slices of American cheese, freshly sliced or grilled onions, fresh, cripsy and hand-leafed lettuce, a slice from the plumpest tomato and our own recipe of spread from 1948 sandwiched between a pair of freshly baked toasted buns made with old-fashioned, slow-rising sponge dough.

items.name: Hamburger
items.description: One 100% American beef patty without additives, fillers or preservatives combined with freshly sliced or grilled onions, fresh, cripsy and hand-leafed lettuce, a slice from the plumpest tomato and our own recipe of spread from 1948 sandwiched between a pair of freshly baked toasted buns made with old-fashioned, slow-rising sponge dough.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: One 100% American beef patties without additives, fillers or preservatives combined with 1 slice of American cheese, freshly sliced or grilled onions, fresh, cripsy and hand-leafed lettuce, a slice from the plumpest tomato and our own recipe of spread from 1948 sandwiched between a pair of freshly baked toasted buns made with old-fashioned, slow-rising sponge dough.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Fresh, hand-cut potatoes prepared in 100% sunflower oil.

items.name: Fountain Drinks
items.description: Refreshing fountain drink with small, medium, large, and extra large sizes.

items.name: Shakes
items.description: Delicious shake made with real ice cream.

items.name: 3x3
items.description: Our 3x3 or Triple Triple has three 100% American patties, hand-leafed lettuce, tomato, spread, three slices of American cheese, with or without onions, stacked high on a freshly baked bun.

items.name: 4x4
items.description: Our 4x4 or Quad Quad has four 100% American patties, hand-leafed lettuce, tomato, spread, four slices of American cheese, with or without onions, stacked high on a freshly baked bun.

items.name: Grilled Cheese
items.description: Two slices of melted American cheese, hand-leafed lettuce, tomato, spread, with or without onions on a freshly banked bun.
